name: Rise of the Funkys
description:
A beat 'em up side scrolling arcade game.
Control a group of 4 unusual bounty hunters on a mission to defeat the biggest criminals in the region.
There's no secret, walk to the right and defeat everyone who stands in your way.

Features:
- 4 unique controllable characters
- Can switch between them mid-combat
- 4 player multiplayer local that can join and leave the game at any time (Requires a controller)
- 6 stages
- 4 bosses (1 secret)
